one_reviews_text:
It´s good & fun. 
But overall Headmaster is the better Soccer Game.
good party game for watching freinds play VR :)

Really had fun for the first few levels, then at maybe level 5 I suddenly have to touch tiny rotating targets and shoot trophies stuck on narrow shelves with a freaking beach ball? Seriously frustrating.
Interesting game. It may become a little repetitive but overall it is fun.
nice game but headmaster is better

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MiNwW1kMk0

I've never been a football fan every since my father drag me to football matches and even brought me season tickets. But I have found a new found love in VR Footaball experiences. I really enjoyed Headmaster which gave me a cool Portal vibe and now this one which throws zombies into the mix. - Awesome stuff!

Thank you for Oculus Touch support, now it's better !
Would be great to add French language / voices...(5 stars if you add this !)
For now, no great interest, need to play more..
Physics are good, level is a bit hard

If you like football, you're surely like this header game. It feels really like heading the ball and getting it into the goal. 
This game gives you alot of fun for a small price.

Very polished and fun experience! My suggestion would be to use floor-level tracking instead of eye-level, and just remind the player to stand up at the start. That way, you don't need the calibration and the floor height is perfect.

I was browsing the store looking for something new to do, to pass the time before Touch launches, saw this and thought "£7... why not". I honestly wasn't expecting much at all... Wow, I was wrong! This game is so much fun! You're actually heading a ball, it feels so natural! If you're considering it, buy it! You won't be disappointed!
i always sucked at soccer. and i totally suck at this game. thats how great a simualtion it is. enjoyed loosing the second stage for hours!
Great little game, very clever use of the lack of touch controllers for a new way to control in VR, hoping we see more imaganitive games like this!
Wasn't expecting it to be this fun or accurate. I keep wanting to kick the ball. Side note: how does Axel leave his apartment if it doesn't have a door?
First game in awhile that makes you smile when playing.
